paddingSchemes
Class CalculationPhase

java.lang.Object
  paddingSchemes.PowerOfTwo
      paddingSchemes.DividedPower
          paddingSchemes.CalculationPhase

public class CalculationPhase
extends DividedPower

CalculationPhase is used in padding scheme calculations. Constructs encrypting and decrypting calculation phases.

Author:
Jukka Tuominen
